channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taipower Steps Up Inspections in Taoyuan as Outages Continue
item.description: State power company Taipower says it will roll out a new inspection plan for Taoyuan as the city has experiences as many as 20 power outages in the past two weeks. It’s raised conc

item.title: Explosion Injures Soldier During Training in Northern Taiwan
item.description: Taiwan’s military says a soldier has been injured after a sudden explosion during an exercise in northern Hsinchu County. The soldier was operating a training explosive when it wen

item.title: Under Half of Taiwan Households Still Subscribe to Cable TV
item.description: Only 49% of households in Taiwan now subscribe to cable TV as streaming services have become increasingly popular over the past decade.

item.title: Los Angeles County Recognizes Taiwanese American Heritage Week
item.description: The Los Angeles County government has passed a bill to officially recognize the third week of May as Taiwanese American Heritage Week. The local Taiwanese community has celebrated
